      • getDefaultWebXML

        protected URL getDefaultWebXML()
                        throws IOException
        Description copied from class: WebArchivist
        Obtains the location of default-web.xml. This allows subclasses to load the file from elsewhere.
        Overrides:
        getDefaultWebXML in class WebArchivist
        Returns:
        null if not found, in which case the default web.xml will not be read and web.xml in the applications need to have everything.
        Throws:
        IOException
